body:
Really thanks Chris and Mona Chris I exactly read your statement in that discussion You say that I have two ways to simulation custom geometry shades: 1: shades made of materials with a high heat capacity/resistance 2:  geometries that I will have to write custom IDF text and connect it to the additionalStrings of the RunSimulation component the material of my facade is wood and distance of two skin (fixed skin and kinetic skin) is 60cm.
Now

I attach my GH file that I connect my facade as context surface could you check that?please it need to IDF text or it is correct? so thanks
